content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 40.0, -84.0) which is extracting iron ore.
- Chest (position 39.5, -85.5) for storing coal.

### Stone Furnace at position(43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 43.0, -82.0) which is currently working and smelting iron ore into iron plates.
  
### Stone Furnace at position(45.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 45.0, -82.0) which is currently working and smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting iron ore into the stone furnaces
- Ensure that you have enough iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the stone furnaces. If you receive a warning about "no ingredients to smelt," check your inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
